modName: Requiem patch for Ducks and Swans
summary: A patch for the food items in Ducks and Swans.
descriptionHtml:
The [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54679/?]Ducks and Swans[/url] mod is a great ambience mod that adds a bit of life to the sometimes empty lakes of skyrim. This patch will make the food items added by Ducks and Swans compatible with the requiem mod by adding a few keywords to them.
[b]
Requirements:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54679/?]Ducks and Swans[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul[/url]

[b]Installation:
[/b]Install the mod by using a mod manager or dragging the .esp file into your Skyrim/Data folder (latter is not recommended).

[b]Load Order:[/b]
LOOT should sort it out by itself, but for the record, a correct load order should look something like this:

Ducks and Swans.esp
...
...
...
Requiem.esp
...
...
...
Requiem - Ducks and Swans.esp
...
...
...
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp
[b]
Uninstallation:[/b]
Just delete the .esp file

[b]Credits:[/b]
The Requiem team
Author of Ducks and Swans "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/776954/?]Tamira[/url]"
author: NeverLost
